text.div:
ServiceDeliveryLocation key value set

This value set defines the set of codes used to identify the service delivery location.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/EntityCode
    CodeDisplay
    WINGWing LocationThe location of a wing of a building (e.g. East Wing). The same room number for the same floor number can be distinguished by wing number in some situations
    ROOMRoom LocationThe location of a room
    BEDBed LocationThe location of a bed
  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/location-hspc-serviceDeliveryLocation-key-value-set

name: ServiceDeliveryLocation key value set
description: This value set defines the set of codes used to identify the service delivery location.
